basics.name: Alex Chen
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full-stack engineer with 8+ years building scalable web applications. Passionate about developer experience, clean architecture, and mentoring junior developers.

work.name: TechCorp Inc
work.summary: Tech lead for core product platform serving 2M+ users
highlights: Led migration from monolith to microservices, reducing deployment time by 75%
Architected real-time messaging system handling 100k messages/second
Mentored team of 6 engineers, 3 promoted to senior roles
Reduced cloud costs by $200k/year through optimization initiatives

work.name: StartupXYZ
work.summary: Full-stack engineer building fintech products from 0 to 1
highlights: Built payment processing system handling $50M+ in transactions
Implemented automated testing pipeline, increasing coverage from 20% to 85%
Developed customer-facing dashboard using React and GraphQL
Collaborated with design team to improve user experience metrics by 40%

work.name: Digital Agency Co
work.summary: Web developer for client projects across various industries
highlights: Delivered 15+ client websites using WordPress, React, and Vue.js
Implemented responsive designs with 98% cross-browser compatibility
Reduced page load times by 60% through optimization techniques

courses: CS 61A: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
CS 170: Efficient Algorithms and Intractable Problems

projects.name: OpenSource CMS
projects.description: Headless CMS with visual editor used by 5k+ developers
highlights: Built plugin architecture supporting 50+ community extensions
Featured in Tech Crunch and Product Hunt #1 product of the day

projects.name: DevTools Extension
projects.description: Browser extension for debugging GraphQL applications
highlights: Used by 50k+ developers with 4.7 star rating
Integrated with Apollo, Relay, and URQL clients

volunteer.summary: Building civic tech tools to improve government services
highlights: Developed public benefits enrollment system used by 10k+ citizens
Mentored 5 new volunteers in full-stack development

awards.title: Hackathon Winner - Best Developer Tool
awards.summary: Built AI-powered code review assistant in 24 hours

awards.title: Employee of the Year
awards.summary: Recognized for exceptional technical contributions and team leadership

publications.name: Building Scalable GraphQL APIs
publications.summary: Deep dive into GraphQL architecture patterns for high-traffic applications

references.name: Sarah Johnson, Engineering Manager at TechCorp
references.reference: Alex is one of the most talented engineers I've worked with. Their technical expertise and mentorship have been invaluable to our team's growth.
